pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: orang tua (secara harfiah, kedua orang tua)

lessons.japanese: その通りの両側に店が並んでいる。
lessons.indonesian: There are stores on each side of the street.

lessons.japanese: その通りの両側に桜の木が並んでいる。
lessons.indonesian: There are cherry trees on each side of the street.

lessons.japanese: 通りの両側には大勢の人がいた。
lessons.indonesian: There were a lot of people on both sides of the street.

lessons.japanese: 桜が道路の両側に植えられている。
lessons.indonesian: The cherry trees are planted on either side of the road.
